materials.raw_text:
8 g of Arsenic (As) 
 8 g of Sodium (Na) 
 4 g of Strontium (Sr) 
 1 g of Titanium (Ti) 
 1 g of Zirconium (Zr)

sourcing.instructions: Arsenic can be sourced from chemical supply companies or online platforms that specialize in rare chemicals. Sodium can be obtained from chemical suppliers or online. Strontium is available from chemical supply companies. Titanium and Zirconium can be sourced from specialized metal suppliers or online chemical vendors. Ensure all materials comply with local regulations for handling and safety.
